author: Dave Gravel
comment: All in all a good watch faces, but with the new update I don't like that you can't customize the colors and it has a stupid ui and it freezes and you can't customize it. Definitely needs more work with the new ui in custom settings!

author: Kelly Norman
comment: I'm not understanding why when you go into settings to configure nothing changes you can't change the color or anything why is that

comment: Can't change color or choose between Celsius and Fahrenheit  because there is not a settings icon.

author: Mark Russell
comment: Works well on Samsung S7 Edge, great work guys.

reply.author: Tamal Basak
reply.content: How can you pay for this app? This app is completely free.,🤔🤔🤔

comment: Well made!  Thank you for a great product

author: Kevin Newton
comment: Like the watch face but it drains my battery

reply.author: Tamal Basak
reply.content:
Sorry for the inconvenience. 
Please restart the mobile to resolve this issue.

author: Cory Shackelton
comment: Can't figure out how to change color, city for weather, Celsius to Fahrenheit, etc...

reply.author: Tamal Basak
reply.content:
Open 'Android Wear' app. Choose SmartFace from the watch face list. Tap on the settings icon. Thats all. 
If you still can't configure the watch face then mail me.
basak.tamal.dev@gmail.com

Note: you don't need to change city for the weather.  The app will automatically find your current location.

title: Good Watch Face, but...
